      • trigger

        public void trigger(@NotNull

      • setTabCompletions

        @NotNull
public OnCommandTrigger setTabCompletions(@NotNull
                                                   java.lang.String... args)

        Sets the tab completion options for the command. This method must be used before setting the command name, otherwise, the tab completions will not be set.

        Parameters:
        args - all the tab completion options.

      • setCommandName

        @NotNull
public OnCommandTrigger setCommandName(@NotNull
                                                java.lang.String commandName)

        Sets the command name. Example: OnCommandTrigger.setCommandName("test") would result in the command being /test

        Parameters:
        commandName - The command name
        Returns:
        the trigger for additional modification

        the trigger for additional modification
